title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.7 - Further action
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 831.7 - Further action

State Regulations

The commission will review the comprehensive plan in its
entirety at least once every six years from the date of the initial adoption of
the comprehensive plan (March 28, 1962). Such review may include consideration
of proposals submitted by the signatory parties, agencies or political
subdivision thereof or other interested parties. The amendments, additions and
deletions adopted by the commission will be compiled and the plan as so revised
shall be made available for public inspection. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
831.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
